text: Brandon Michael Green (born 23 July 1988), better known by his stage name Maejor (formerly Bei Maejor and later Maejor Ali) is an American record producer, rapper, singer and songwriter. He is one half of the duo AREA21 alongside Dutch DJ Martin Garrix. Maejor has co-produced and written songs for many artists. == References == Category:Living people Category:1988 births Category:African-American singers Category:American pop singers Category:American hip hop singers Category:American record producers Category:American hip hop musicians Category:Singers from Michigan Category:American R&B; singers Category:American electronic musicians
title: Maejor
